mapper.select: select account, user_id, username, usernick, password, name, rights, role_id, last_login, ip, status, bz, phone, sfid, start_time, end_time, years, email, number, integral, usernick, sex, headImgUrl, weixin_open_id, img_src_z, img_src_f, if_audit, nim_token, community_id from sys_app_user where user_id = #{user_id}
